roleset.name: to bring together, collect into one sum, mass, or body
roleset.note: AGGREGATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'aggregate' based on dictionary.com.frame by Perryn (from aggregate.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: attribute, descriptor of state where arg1 aggregates

example.name: gather
example.text: John aggregated the legos into a bucket.

example.name: with arg2
example.text: [While cells]-1 aggregated *trace*-1 at 37 degrees C formed compact aggregates

example.name: Arg0, 1
example.text: Chamberlin has coached National League teams during five previous seasons and each year he piloted his aggregation of gridiron workers to the top of the ranks.
